name: tokyo
description: This imperial stout is brewed with copious amounts of speciality malts, jasmine and cranberries.

name: RIS Barrel Aged
description: Beer with a hefty amount of alcohol and rich chocolate and coffee aromas from dark malts. To enhance the overall impression, this special release was aged in whiskey barrels for over six months

name: c4
description: If APA was hoppy, then it's only natural to hop up IPA even more, and make it EXPLOSIVE!
